summary: In Xochimilco 1909, María Candelaria and Lorenzo Rafael long for getting married but the odds are against them. Maria Candelaria is segregated for being a prostitute's child and the couple ... See full summary »
cast: Dolores del Rio|Pedro Armendáriz|Alberto Galán|Margarita Cortés|Miguel Inclán|Beatriz Ramos|Rafael Icardo|Julio Ahuet|Lupe del Castillo|Lupe Inclán|Salvador Quiroz|Nieves|Elda Loza|Lupe Garnica|Alfonso Jiménez|Aurora Ruiz|Arturo Soto Rangel|Irma Torres|José Torvay|David Valle González|Enrique Zambrano
title: María Candelaria (Xochimilco)
